name: 拉尔夫·李维斯 Ralph Lewis
intro: Ralph Lewis was born on October 8, 1872 in Englewood, Illinois, USA as Ralph Percy Lewis. He was an actor, known for The Birth of a Nation (1915), Casey Jones (1927) and The Wolf Man (1915). He was married to Vera Lewis. He died on December 4, 1937 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
birthplace: 美国,伊利诺伊州,恩格尔伍德
